title: Devil In Disguise
description:
Danger lurks around every corner so we do whatever we can to avoid it. Most dangers are easy to avoid if you pay attention. But it’s the malevolent unknown that you should fear the most because you never know when you might come across a devil in disguise.

First, no memories of a monster
Followed by hurricane ghost stories
Then, the statues are watching
Finally in our featured story, a most deadly game

Get started at Stitch Fix today at stitchfix.com/scary for 25% off if you keep everything in your Fix!
Download Best Fiends today for FREE on the App Store or Google Play
